attributes.action: To increase tuition fees in Scotland to match England
attributes.additional_details:
Currently Scotland are set to keep its Tuition fees for Universities Fees in 2012 where south of the boarder have to pay upto £9000 a year.

So I would like the government to force Scotland to rise the limit from £0 to £9000 for its citizens. As the English tax-payer shouldn't be paying for Scottish Student Fees when we have to pay for our own.

rejection.details: Education is a devolved matter for the Scottish Parliament
